WorkItem.Description:
I have been trying to model this in Rawr, but neither putting in the current proc (+25% white damage) or the PTR proc (680 weapon damage) make any difference to the value of the trinket (over the value of the trinket with no proc - ie. just the flat 321 Agi).
 
I have tried resetting the cache and also quitting out and reloading Rawr, but nothing seems to change it.
 
Attached my character in case it is of help.

Comments.Message: I just double checked and the trinket is modeled correctly, both in SpecialEffects and in the default data cache.
I'm not gunna worry about the +25% white dmg, but will get the 680 weapon damage modeled for .18.

Thanks.   We had 2 of these drop last night and I let them go as current theorycraft is not to keen on it.   Much better for the guild to sell them and use the gold for repairs & flasks etc.   Having looked at the change to it though, it may actually be a decent upgrade in which case I may request it back again (if not already sold)
Took a quick look. Cat has the WeaponDamage relevant and it's pulling it from its sources, but it isn't actually using the stat.
Am I right in thinking this didn't make it into 4.0.17b?
